Posts.Content: May 31, 2012 10:41PM Wolebearsvicky wrote: Hi there...I found out at my mamo on Oct. 18th ,2011.....saw the surgeon on the 20th and they didn't schedule MY surgery till November 30th .....and I had both Breast removed and at that time I was told I had stage O breast cancer ....when I got the path report AFTER my surgery I was diagnosised stage 3 triple negative and all my nodes on my left side were removed .....also started reconstructed surgery started as well......so I guess there was a long wait for my surgery as well....didn't look at it that way as my family came for the Thanksgiving holiday n surgery was the following Wed.......hugs
Posts.Title: Six week wait until surgery??? emtlady emtlady
